Observation counts for 2010-06-02
=================================

sensor | files |  records   |    ref     |  clearsky  |  ref obs   |  sub-scene | sub-scene  | 
       |       | 2010-06-02 |    obs     |  ref obs   | w/o coord  |     obs    | w/o coord  | 
-------+-------+------------+------------+------------+------------+------------+------------+
aatsr  |     1 |    1966    |    1966    |    1759    |    1759    |       -    |       -    | 
metop  |     3 |    8253    |    8253    |    4282    |    4282    |    7969    |     284    | 
seviri |     3 |    5800    |       -    |       -    |       -    |    5800    |       0    | 

For AATSR the MD file contains data of the complete month. For METOP and SEVIRI we read files 2010-06-01 and 2010-06-03 in addition which reveals 3 additional METOP entries and 221 additional SEVIRI entries from the adjacent files being in 2010-06-02 in fact.

The following list are all 284 record numbers in file mdb1_metop02_20100602.nc that do not have coordinates in all four corners of the subscene. They are dropped for this reason.
